lead_paragraph: DRESCHER--Dora, 90. Died peacefully at home on April 9. Devoted wife of Mayer, loving mother to Sol, Jack and Murry. Loving mother-in-law to Anne Drescher and second mother to John DiGregorio and Nishan Kazazian. Cherished Baba of Daniel, David, Rebecca, Benjamin, Ilana and Gabriella. Beloved sister of Etka Rosenman, Martin and Bea Gayer. From Tyszowce, Poland. In 1939, 14 year old Dvoira Gajer persuaded an extended family to flee the Nazi invasion. Refugees for ten years, they survived Siberian labor camps, war years in Uzbekistan and displaced persons camps in Germany. Arrived in America in 1949, raised her family in Brooklyn and retired to Sunrise, Florida. The family she saved now flourishes on three continents. Funeral services April 11 at Star of David Chapel, North Lauderdale. Donations in her name to Jewish Family Services of Broward and David Posnack Jewish Day School. 1/3
